title: 26 Comical Cat Memes for People Who Prefer Floofy Felines to Humans
description: Cats are great. We think we can all agree on this simple fact. At least it's a common thought between all cat pawrents, general feline fanatic fanes, and all the crazy cat ladies around the world. That's a lot of people who think cats are great. But… they are! Regardless of whether other people don't think that cats are great. But they're wrong, because cats are great. And, honestly, most cats are greater than other humans. That's how great cats are.Now, we can agree on that fact easily, but you know what else? We think cat memes are great. No, not just great - we think cat memes are the best kind of memes. It's no wonder cat memes rule the internet, it's because they're the greatest. Cat memes are funnier than most other memes, and they're definitely cuter and much more adorable. When you look at some wholesome cat memes you get this warm and fuzzy feeling, and you also laugh - which is a great bonus. So, are cats great? Yes. Are cat memes great? Yes.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 26 Comical Cat Memes for People Who Prefer Floofy Felines to Humans - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Cats are great. We think we can all agree on this simple fact. At least it's a common thought between all cat pawrents, general feline fanatic fanes, and all the crazy cat ladies around the world. That's a lot of people who think cats are great. But… they are! Regardless of whether other people don't think that cats are great. But they're wrong, because cats are great. And, honestly, most cats are greater than other humans. That's how great cats are.

Now, we can agree on that fact easily, but you know what else? We think cat memes are great. No, not just great - we think cat memes are the best kind of memes. It's no wonder cat memes rule the internet, it's because they're the greatest. Cat memes are funnier than most other memes, and they're definitely cuter and much more adorable. When you look at some wholesome cat memes you get this warm and fuzzy feeling, and you also laugh - which is a great bonus. So, are cats great? Yes. Are cat memes great? Yes.
